title: AMQP connection refused from 2.13.1 but working until 2.13.0

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
I'm updating a Quarkus application that uses reactive AMQP messaging connector with a customized underlying Vert.x client, SSL and client certificate authentication (as explained in https://quarkus.io/guides/amqp-reference#customizing-the-underlying-amqp-client).

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41650706/225554738-29bdbee5-a5fd-4151-9316-a23546fb6fd2.png)

Up to 2.13.0.Final it's working and connecting to the AMQP broker, but from 2.13.1.Final it's unable to connect to the broker due to **connection refused**.

The only difference I saw it'a Vert.x update from 4.3.3 to 4.3.4 (with changes as https://github.com/vert-x3/vertx-amqp-client/pull/80/commits/8d92ddb543f7df5f9925730f452bf2d5713161ce), but I donâ€™t understand if this needs other configuration in the AmqpClientOptions different from documentation.
